package.description: This package is designed to operate, query, and control Robotis Dynamixel 'smart' Servos using a USB2Dynamixel adaptor. It has been tested on the RX-28 and RX-64 servo variants.
package.author: Travis Deyle, Advait Jain, Marc Killpack, Advisor: Prof. Charlie Kemp, Lab: Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech
